mn36:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
mn36:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ sunivattho hoti pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṁ piṇḍāya pavisitukāmo.
mn36:3.1_0: Atha kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā tenupasaṅkami.
mn36:3.2_0: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando saccakaṁ nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
mn36:3.4_0: “ayaṁ, bhante, saccako nigaṇṭhaputto āgacchati bhassappavādako paṇḍitavādo sādhusammato bahujanassa.
mn36:3.5_0: Eso kho, bhante, avaṇṇakāmo buddhassa, avaṇṇakāmo dhammassa, avaṇṇakāmo saṅghassa.
mn36:3.6_0: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā muhuttaṁ nisīdatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
mn36:3.8_0: Atha kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn36:3.8_2: sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn36:3.8_3: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn36:4.1_0: “Santi, bho gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kāyabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti, no cittabhāvanaṁ.
mn36:4.2_0: Phusanti hi te, bho gotama, sārīrikaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ.
mn36:4.3_2: sārīrikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭhassa sato ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissati,
mn36:4.4_0: Tassa kho etaṁ, bho gotama, kāyanvayaṁ cittaṁ hoti, kāyassa vasena vattati.
mn36:4.7_0: Santi pana, bho gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā cittabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti, no kāyabhāvanaṁ.
mn36:4.8_0: Phusanti hi te, bho gotama, cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ vedanaṁ.
mn36:4.9_2: cetasikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭhassa sato ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissati,
mn36:4.10_0: Tassa kho eso, bho gotama, cittanvayo kāyo hoti, cittassa vasena vattati.
mn36:4.13_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bho gotama, evaṁ hoti:
mn36:4.14_0: ‘addhā bhoto gotamassa sāvakā cittabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti, no kāyabhāvanan’”ti.
mn36:5.3_0: nando vaccho, kiso saṅkicco, makkhali gosālo—
mn36:5.4_2: acelakā muttācārā hatthāpalekhanā naehibhaddantikā natiṭṭhabhaddantikā na abhihaṭaṁ na uddissakataṁ na nimantanaṁ sādiyanti,
mn36:5.5_0: te na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhanti na kaḷopimukhā paṭiggaṇhanti na eḷakamantaraṁ na daṇḍamantaraṁ na musalamantaraṁ
mn36:5.5_1: na dvinnaṁ bhuñjamānānaṁ na gabbhiniyā na pāyamānāya na purisantaragatāya na saṅkittīsu na yattha sā
mn36:5.5_2: upaṭṭhito hoti na yattha makkhikā saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī,
mn36:5.5_3: na macchaṁ na maṁsaṁ na suraṁ na merayaṁ na thusodakaṁ pivanti.
mn36:5.6_0: Te ekāgārikā vā honti ekālopikā, dvāgārikā vā honti dvālopikā …pe… sattāgārikā vā honti sattālopikā.
mn36:5.7_0: Ekissāpi dattiyā yāpenti, dvīhipi dattīhi yāpenti …pe… sattahipi dattīhi yāpenti.
mn36:6.4_0: Te imaṁ kāyaṁ balaṁ gāhenti nāma, brūhenti nāma, medenti nāmā”ti.
mn36:6.5_0: “Yaṁ kho te, aggivessana, purimaṁ pahāya pacchā upacinanti, evaṁ imassa kāyassa ācayāpacayo hoti.
mn36:6.6_0: Kinti pana te, aggivessana, cittabhāvanā sutā”ti?
mn36:6.7_0: Cittabhāvanāya kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavatā puṭṭho samāno na sampāyāsi.
mn36:7.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā saccakaṁ nigaṇṭhaputtaṁ etadavoca:
mn36:7.2_2: purimā kāyabhāvanā bhāsitā sāpi ariyassa vinaye no dhammikā kāyabhāvanā.
mn36:7.3_0: Kāyabhāvanampi kho tvaṁ, aggivessana, na aññāsi, kuto pana tvaṁ cittabhāvanaṁ jānissasi?
mn36:7.4_2: yathā abhāvitakāyo ca hoti abhāvitacitto ca,
mn36:7.5_0: Taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn36:7.6_0: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato paccassosi.
mn36:8.1_0: “Kathañca, aggivessana, abhāvitakāyo ca hoti abhāvitacitto ca?
mn36:8.2_0: Idha, aggivessana, assutavato puthujjanassa uppajjati sukhā vedanā.
mn36:8.3_0: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno sukhasārāgī ca hoti sukhasārāgitañca āpajjati.
mn36:8.5_0: Sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanā.
mn36:8.6_0: So dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn36:8.7_2: uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati abhāvitattā kāyassa,
mn36:8.7_3: uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati abhāvitattā cittassa.
mn36:8.8_2: evaṁ ubhatopakkhaṁ uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati abhāvitattā kāyassa,
mn36:8.8_3: uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati abhāvitattā cittassa, evaṁ kho,
mn36:9.1_0: Kathañca, aggivessana, bhāvitakāyo ca hoti bhāvitacitto ca?
mn36:9.2_0: Idha, aggivessana, sutavato ariyasāvakassa uppajjati sukhā vedanā.
mn36:9.3_0: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na sukhasārāgī ca hoti, na sukhasārāgitañca āpajjati.
mn36:9.5_0: Sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanā.
mn36:9.6_0: So dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṁ kandati na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn36:9.7_2: uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati bhāvitattā kāyassa,
mn36:9.7_3: uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati bhāvitattā cittassa.
mn36:9.8_2: evaṁ ubhatopakkhaṁ uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati bhāvitattā kāyassa,
mn36:9.8_3: uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati bhāvitattā cittassa. Evaṁ kho,
mn36:10.2_0: Bhavañhi gotamo bhāvitakāyo ca hoti bhāvitacitto cā”ti.
mn36:10.3_0: “Addhā kho te ayaṁ, aggivessana, āsajja upanīya vācā bhāsitā,
mn36:10.5_2: kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito,
mn36:10.5_3: taṁ vata me uppannā vā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati,
mn36:10.5_4: uppannā vā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
mn36:11.1_0: “Na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati tathārūpā sukhā vedanā yathārūpā uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya;
mn36:11.1_1: na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati tathārūpā dukkhā vedanā yathārūpā uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
mn36:12.2_0: Idha me, aggivessana, pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
mn36:12.4_0: Nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
mn36:12.5_0: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan’ti.
mn36:13.1_3: susukāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā,
mn36:13.1_5: kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajiṁ.
mn36:13.2_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno kiṅkusalagavesī anuttaraṁ santivarapadaṁ pariyesamāno yena āḷāro kālāmo tenupasaṅkamiṁ;
mn36:13.3_0: ‘icchāmahaṁ, āvuso kālāma, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye brahmacariyaṁ caritun’ti.
mn36:13.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, aggivessana, āḷāro kālāmo maṁ etadavoca:
mn36:13.6_0: tādiso ayaṁ dhammo yattha viññū puriso nacirasseva sakaṁ ācariyakaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyā’ti.
mn36:13.7_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, nacirasseva khippameva taṁ dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇiṁ.
mn36:13.8_2: tāvatakeneva oṭṭhapahatamattena lapitalāpanamattena ñāṇavādañca vadāmi theravādañca,
mn36:13.10_0: ‘na kho āḷāro kālāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedeti,
mn36:13.11_0: addhā āḷāro kālāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ jānaṁ passaṁ viharatī’ti.
mn36:13.13_2: imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesī’ti?
mn36:13.14_0: Evaṁ vutte, aggivessana, āḷāro kālāmo ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ pavedesi.
mn36:13.16_0: ‘na kho āḷārasseva kālāmassa atthi saddhā, mayhampatthi saddhā;
mn36:13.17_0: na kho āḷārasseva kālāmassa atthi vīriyaṁ, mayhampatthi vīriyaṁ;
mn36:13.18_0: na kho āḷārasseva kālāmassa atthi sati, mayhampatthi sati;
mn36:13.19_0: na kho āḷārasseva kālāmassa atthi samādhi, mayhampatthi samādhi;
mn36:13.20_0: na kho āḷārasseva kālāmassa atthi paññā, mayhampatthi paññā;
mn36:13.21_0: yannūnāhaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ āḷāro kālāmo sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedeti tassa dhammassa sacchikiriyāya padaheyyan’ti.
mn36:13.22_2: nacirasseva khippameva taṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
mn36:14.2_0: ‘ettāvatā no, āvuso kālāma, imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedesī’ti?
mn36:14.3_0: ‘Ettāvatā kho ahaṁ, āvuso, imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedemī’ti.
mn36:14.4_0: ‘Ahampi kho, āvuso, ettāvatā imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn36:14.6_0: ye mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ tādisaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ passāma.
mn36:14.7_0: Iti yāhaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedemi taṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharasi;
mn36:14.8_0: yaṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharasi tamahaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedemi.
mn36:14.9_0: Iti yāhaṁ dhammaṁ jānāmi taṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ jānāsi; yaṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ jānāsi tamahaṁ dhammaṁ jānāmi.
mn36:14.10_0: Iti yādiso ahaṁ tādiso tuvaṁ, yādiso tuvaṁ tādiso ahaṁ.
mn36:14.11_0: Ehi dāni, āvuso, ubhova santā imaṁ gaṇaṁ pariharāmā’ti.
mn36:14.12_2: āḷāro kālāmo ācariyo me samāno attano antevāsiṁ maṁ samānaṁ attanā samasamaṁ ṭhapesi,
mn36:14.14_0: ‘nāyaṁ dhammo nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati,
mn36:14.15_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, taṁ dhammaṁ analaṅkaritvā tasmā dhammā nibbijja apakkamiṁ.
mn36:15.1_2: kiṅkusalagavesī anuttaraṁ santivarapadaṁ pariyesamāno yena udako rāmaputto tenupasaṅkamiṁ;
mn36:15.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, aggivessana, udako rāmaputto maṁ etadavoca:
mn36:15.5_0: tādiso ayaṁ dhammo yattha viññū puriso nacirasseva sakaṁ ācariyakaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyā’ti.
mn36:15.6_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, nacirasseva khippameva taṁ dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇiṁ.
mn36:15.7_2: tāvatakeneva oṭṭhapahatamattena lapitalāpanamattena ñāṇavādañca vadāmi theravādañca,
mn36:15.9_0: ‘na kho rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ kevalaṁ saddhāmattakena sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesi.
mn36:15.10_0: Addhā rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ jānaṁ passaṁ vihāsī’ti.
mn36:15.12_0: ‘kittāvatā no āvuso rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesī’ti?
mn36:15.13_0: Evaṁ vutte, aggivessana, udako rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ pavedesi.
mn36:15.15_0: ‘na kho rāmasseva ahosi saddhā, mayhampatthi saddhā;
mn36:15.16_0: na kho rāmasseva ahosi vīriyaṁ, mayhampatthi vīriyaṁ;
mn36:15.17_0: na kho rāmasseva ahosi sati, mayhampatthi sati;
mn36:15.18_0: na kho rāmasseva ahosi samādhi, mayhampatthi samādhi;
mn36:15.19_0: na kho rāmasseva ahosi paññā, mayhampatthi paññā;
mn36:15.20_0: yannūnāhaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ rāmo sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesi tassa dhammassa sacchikiriyāya padaheyyan’ti.
mn36:15.21_2: nacirasseva khippameva taṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
mn36:15.23_0: ‘ettāvatā no āvuso rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedesī’ti?
mn36:15.24_0: ‘Ettāvatā kho āvuso rāmo imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedesī’ti.
mn36:15.25_0: ‘Ahampi kho, āvuso, ettāvatā imaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
mn36:15.27_0: ye mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ tādisaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ passāma.
mn36:15.28_0: Iti yaṁ dhammaṁ rāmo sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedesi,
mn36:15.28_1: taṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharasi;
mn36:15.28_2: yaṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharasi,
mn36:15.28_3: taṁ dhammaṁ rāmo sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja pavedesi.
mn36:15.29_0: Iti yaṁ dhammaṁ rāmo abhiññāsi taṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ jānāsi;
mn36:15.29_1: yaṁ tvaṁ dhammaṁ jānāsi taṁ dhammaṁ rāmo abhiññāsi.
mn36:15.30_0: Iti yādiso rāmo ahosi tādiso tuvaṁ; yādiso tuvaṁ tādiso rāmo ahosi.
mn36:15.31_0: Ehi dāni, āvuso, tuvaṁ imaṁ gaṇaṁ pariharā’ti.
mn36:15.32_2: udako rāmaputto sabrahmacārī me samāno ācariyaṭṭhāne ca maṁ ṭhapesi,
mn36:15.34_0: ‘nāyaṁ dhammo nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati,
mn36:15.35_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, taṁ dhammaṁ analaṅkaritvā tasmā dhammā nibbijja apakkamiṁ.
mn36:16.1_2: kiṅkusalagavesī anuttaraṁ santivarapadaṁ pariyesamāno magadhesu anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena uruvelā senānigamo tadavasariṁ.
mn36:16.4_2: nadī ca sandati setakā supatitthā ramaṇīyā,
mn36:16.6_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, tattheva nisīdiṁ
mn36:17.1_0: Apissumaṁ, aggivessana, tisso upamā paṭibhaṁsu anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā.
mn36:17.2_0: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, allaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ sasnehaṁ udake nikkhittaṁ.
mn36:17.6_0: api nu so puriso amuṁ allaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ sasnehaṁ,
mn36:17.9_0: “Aduñhi, bho gotama, allaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ sasnehaṁ, tañca pana udake nikkhittaṁ.
mn36:17.10_0: Yāvadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
mn36:17.11_2: ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena ceva cittena ca kāmehi avūpakaṭṭhā viharanti,
mn36:17.11_3: yo ca nesaṁ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho,
mn36:17.11_4: so ca ajjhattaṁ na suppahīno hoti,
mn36:17.11_6: opakkamikā cepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti,
mn36:17.11_7: abhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
mn36:17.12_0: No cepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti,
mn36:17.12_1: abhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
mn36:17.13_0: Ayaṁ kho maṁ, aggivessana, paṭhamā upamā paṭibhāsi anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā.
mn36:18.1_0: Aparāpi kho maṁ, aggivessana, dutiyā upamā paṭibhāsi anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā.
mn36:18.2_0: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, allaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ sasnehaṁ, ārakā udakā thale nikkhittaṁ.
mn36:18.6_0: api nu so puriso amuṁ allaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ sasnehaṁ,
mn36:18.6_2: uttarāraṇiṁ ādāya abhimanthento aggiṁ abhinibbatteyya tejo pātukareyyā”ti?
mn36:18.9_0: “Aduñhi, bho gotama, allaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ sasnehaṁ, kiñcāpi ārakā udakā thale nikkhittaṁ.
mn36:18.10_0: Yāvadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
mn36:18.11_2: ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena ceva cittena ca kāmehi vūpakaṭṭhā viharanti,
mn36:18.11_3: yo ca nesaṁ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho so ca ajjhattaṁ na suppahīno hoti,
mn36:18.11_5: opakkamikā cepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti,
mn36:18.11_6: abhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
mn36:18.11_7: No cepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti,
mn36:18.11_8: abhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
mn36:18.12_0: Ayaṁ kho maṁ, aggivessana, dutiyā upamā paṭibhāsi anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā
mn36:19.1_0: Aparāpi kho maṁ, aggivessana, tatiyā upamā paṭibhāsi anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā.
mn36:19.2_0: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, sukkhaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ koḷāpaṁ, ārakā udakā thale nikkhittaṁ.
mn36:19.6_0: api nu so puriso amuṁ sukkhaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ koḷāpaṁ,
mn36:19.9_0: “Aduñhi, bho gotama, sukkhaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ koḷāpaṁ, tañca pana ārakā udakā thale nikkhittan”ti.
mn36:19.10_2: ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena ceva cittena ca kāmehi vūpakaṭṭhā viharanti,
mn36:19.10_3: yo ca nesaṁ kāmesu kāmacchando kāmasneho kāmamucchā kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho,
mn36:19.10_4: so ca ajjhattaṁ suppahīno hoti suppaṭippassaddho,
mn36:19.10_5: opakkamikā cepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti,
mn36:19.10_6: bhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
mn36:19.10_7: No cepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti,
mn36:19.10_8: bhabbāva te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
mn36:19.11_0: Ayaṁ kho maṁ, aggivessana, tatiyā upamā paṭibhāsi anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā.
mn36:19.12_0: Imā kho maṁ, aggivessana, tisso upamā paṭibhaṁsu anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā.
mn36:20.4_2: dantebhi dantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṁ āhacca cetasā cittaṁ abhiniggaṇhato abhinippīḷayato abhisantāpayato kacchehi sedā muccanti.
mn36:20.5_2: balavā puriso dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ sīse vā gahetvā khandhe vā gahetvā abhiniggaṇheyya abhinippīḷeyya abhisantāpeyya;
mn36:20.6_4: cetasā cittaṁ abhiniggaṇhato abhinippīḷayato abhisantāpayato kacchehi sedā muccanti.
mn36:20.7_4: sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena padhānābhitunnassa sato.
mn36:20.8_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:21.3_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, mukhato ca nāsato ca assāsapassāse uparundhiṁ.
mn36:21.4_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu kaṇṇasotehi vātānaṁ nikkhamantānaṁ adhimatto saddo hoti.
mn36:21.5_0: Seyyathāpi nāma kammāragaggariyā dhamamānāya adhimatto saddo hoti;
mn36:21.6_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu kaṇṇasotehi vātānaṁ nikkhamantānaṁ adhimatto saddo hoti.
mn36:21.7_2: vīriyaṁ hoti asallīnaṁ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā.
mn36:21.7_3: Sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena padhānābhitunnassa sato.
mn36:21.8_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:22.3_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāse uparundhiṁ.
mn36:22.4_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
mn36:22.5_0: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya;
mn36:22.6_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
mn36:22.7_2: vīriyaṁ hoti asallīnaṁ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā.
mn36:22.7_3: Sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena padhānābhitunnassa sato.
mn36:22.8_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:23.3_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāse uparundhiṁ.
mn36:23.4_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā honti.
mn36:23.5_0: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṁ dadeyya;
mn36:23.6_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā honti.
mn36:23.7_2: vīriyaṁ hoti asallīnaṁ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā.
mn36:23.7_3: Sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena padhānābhitunnassa sato.
mn36:23.8_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:24.3_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāse uparundhiṁ.
mn36:24.4_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimattā vātā kucchiṁ parikantanti.
mn36:24.5_2: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṁ parikanteyya;
mn36:24.6_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimattā vātā kucchiṁ parikantanti.
mn36:24.7_2: vīriyaṁ hoti asallīnaṁ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā.
mn36:24.7_3: Sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena padhānābhitunnassa sato.
mn36:24.8_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:25.3_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāse uparundhiṁ.
mn36:25.4_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimatto kāyasmiṁ ḍāho hoti.
mn36:25.5_2: dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ samparitāpeyyuṁ;
mn36:25.6_2: mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu adhimatto kāyasmiṁ ḍāho hoti.
mn36:25.7_2: vīriyaṁ hoti asallīnaṁ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā.
mn36:25.7_3: Sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena padhānābhitunnassa sato.
mn36:25.8_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:26.1_0: Apissu maṁ, aggivessana, devatā disvā evamāhaṁsu:
mn36:26.4_0: ‘na kālaṅkato samaṇo gotamo, api ca kālaṁ karotī’ti.
mn36:26.6_3: vihāro tveva so arahato evarūpo hotī’ti.
mn36:27.3_0: Atha kho maṁ, aggivessana, devatā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
mn36:27.4_0: ‘mā kho tvaṁ, mārisa, sabbaso āhārupacchedāya paṭipajji.
mn36:27.5_2: tassa te mayaṁ dibbaṁ ojaṁ lomakūpehi ajjhohāressāma,
mn36:27.7_1: imā ca me devatā dibbaṁ ojaṁ lomakūpehi ajjhohāreyyuṁ,
mn36:27.8_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, tā devatā paccācikkhāmi, ‘halan’ti vadāmi.
mn36:28.5_0: Seyyathāpi nāma āsītikapabbāni vā kāḷapabbāni vā;
mn36:28.6_0: Seyyathāpi nāma oṭṭhapadaṁ; evamevassu me ānisadaṁ hoti tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:28.7_0: Seyyathāpi nāma vaṭṭanāvaḷī; evamevassu me piṭṭhikaṇṭako uṇṇatāvanato hoti tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:28.8_0: Seyyathāpi nāma jarasālāya gopānasiyo oluggaviluggā bhavanti;
mn36:28.8_1: evamevassu me phāsuḷiyo oluggaviluggā bhavanti tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:28.9_0: Seyyathāpi nāma gambhīre udapāne udakatārakā gambhīragatā okkhāyikā dissanti;
mn36:28.9_1: evamevassu me akkhikūpesu akkhitārakā gambhīragatā okkhāyikā dissanti tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:28.10_0: Seyyathāpi nāma tittakālābu āmakacchinno vātātapena samphuṭito hoti sammilāto;
mn36:28.10_1: evamevassu me sīsacchavi samphuṭitā hoti sammilātā tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:28.12_2: vaccaṁ vā muttaṁ vā karissāmīti tattheva avakujjo papatāmi tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:28.13_2: imameva kāyaṁ assāsento pāṇinā gattāni anumajjāmi.
mn36:28.13_5: pāṇinā gattāni anumajjato pūtimūlāni lomāni kāyasmā papatanti tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:29.1_0: Apissu maṁ, aggivessana, manussā disvā evamāhaṁsu: ‘kāḷo samaṇo gotamo’ti.
mn36:29.2_0: Ekacce manussā evamāhaṁsu: ‘na kāḷo samaṇo gotamo, sāmo samaṇo gotamo’ti.
mn36:29.3_0: Ekacce manussā evamāhaṁsu: ‘na kāḷo samaṇo gotamo, napi sāmo, maṅguracchavi samaṇo gotamo’ti.
mn36:29.4_0: Yāvassu me, aggivessana, tāva parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto upahato hoti tāyevappāhāratāya.
mn36:30.2_0: ‘ye kho keci atītamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayiṁsu,
mn36:30.3_0: Yepi hi keci anāgatamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayissanti,
mn36:30.4_0: Yepi hi keci etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti,
mn36:30.5_0: Na kho panāhaṁ imāya kaṭukāya dukkarakārikāya adhigacchāmi uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ.
mn36:30.6_0: Siyā nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā’ti?
mn36:31.2_0: ‘abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ pitu sakkassa kammante sītāya jambucchāyāya nisinno vivicceva kāmehi vivicca
mn36:31.2_1: akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharitā.
mn36:31.3_0: Siyā nu kho eso maggo bodhāyā’ti?
mn36:31.4_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, aggivessana, satānusāri viññāṇaṁ ahosi:
mn36:32.2_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
mn36:32.2_1: yaṁ taṁ sukhaṁ aññatreva kāmehi aññatra akusalehi dhammehī’ti?
mn36:32.4_0: ‘na kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, yaṁ taṁ sukhaṁ aññatreva kāmehi aññatra akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
mn36:33.2_0: ‘na kho taṁ sukaraṁ sukhaṁ adhigantuṁ evaṁ adhimattakasimānaṁ pattakāyena,
mn36:33.3_0: So kho ahaṁ, aggivessana, oḷārikaṁ āhāraṁ āhāresiṁ odanakummāsaṁ.
mn36:33.4_0: Tena kho pana maṁ, aggivessana, samayena pañca bhikkhū paccupaṭṭhitā honti:
mn36:33.5_0: ‘yaṁ kho samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ adhigamissati, taṁ no ārocessatī’ti.
mn36:33.6_3: atha me te pañca bhikkhū nibbijja pakkamiṁsu:
mn36:34.1_4: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
mn36:34.2_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:35-37.1_0: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
mn36:35-37.2_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:35-37.3_0: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca vihāsiṁ,
mn36:35-37.3_2: Sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedesiṁ yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
mn36:35-37.3_3: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
mn36:35-37.4_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:35-37.5_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā,
mn36:35-37.5_2: adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
mn36:35-37.6_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:38.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
mn36:38.2_2: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarāmi.
mn36:39.1_0: Ayaṁ kho me, aggivessana, rattiyā paṭhame yāme paṭhamā vijjā adhigatā;
mn36:39.2_4: yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
mn36:39.3_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:40.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
mn36:40.2_0: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe
mn36:40.2_1: dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi …pe…
mn36:41.1_0: ayaṁ kho me, aggivessana, rattiyā majjhime yāme dutiyā vijjā adhigatā;
mn36:41.2_4: yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
mn36:41.3_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:42.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
mn36:43.1_0: Tassa me evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha,
mn36:43.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsiṁ.
mn36:44.1_0: Ayaṁ kho me, aggivessana, rattiyā pacchime yāme tatiyā vijjā adhigatā;
mn36:44.2_4: yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
mn36:44.3_0: Evarūpāpi kho me, aggivessana, uppannā sukhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn36:45.1_0: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ, aggivessana, anekasatāya parisāya dhammaṁ desetā.
mn36:45.4_0: Na kho panetaṁ, aggivessana, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ;
mn36:45.5_0: yāvadeva viññāpanatthāya tathāgato paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.
mn36:45.6_3: tasmiṁyeva purimasmiṁ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṁ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṁ karomi samādahāmi,
mn36:45.7_0: “Okappaniyametaṁ bhoto gotamassa yathā taṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
mn36:45.8_0: Abhijānāti kho pana bhavaṁ gotamo divā supitā”ti?
mn36:46.1_2: gimhānaṁ pacchime māse pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññapetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno niddaṁ okkamitā”ti.
mn36:46.2_0: “Etaṁ kho, bho gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammohavihārasmiṁ vadantī”ti?
mn36:46.3_0: “Na kho, aggivessana, ettāvatā sammūḷho vā hoti asammūḷho vā.
mn36:46.4_0: Api ca, aggivessana, yathā sammūḷho ca hoti asammūḷho ca,
mn36:46.5_0: taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn36:46.6_0: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato paccassosi.
mn36:47.1_2: ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā appahīnā,
mn36:47.3_2: ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā pahīnā,
mn36:47.5_2: ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
mn36:47.6_0: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna virūḷhiyā;
mn36:47.7_2: tathāgatassa ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā
mn36:48.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn36:48.3_0: Yāvañcidaṁ bhoto gotamassa evaṁ āsajja āsajja vuccamānassa,
mn36:48.4_0: Abhijānāmahaṁ, bho gotama, pūraṇaṁ kassapaṁ vādena vādaṁ samārabhitā.
mn36:48.5_0: Sopi mayā vādena vādaṁ samāraddho aññenaññaṁ paṭicari,
mn36:48.6_0: Bhoto pana gotamassa evaṁ āsajja āsajja vuccamānassa,
mn36:48.12_0: Sopi mayā vādena vādaṁ samāraddho aññenaññaṁ paṭicari,
mn36:48.13_0: Bhoto pana gotamassa evaṁ āsajja āsajja vuccamānassa,
mn36:48.14_0: Handa ca dāni mayaṁ, bho gotama, gacchāma.
mn36:48.17_0: Atha kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
